lang.p: "Web Messanger" - is unique software allowing visitors of your site to chat with your operators.

"Web Messenger" makes it easier to communicate with existing and potential clients. It's enough to click the button and ask a question in opened friendly dialog window. Be available 24/7. Amused by perfect service they will come back again and again.
Features:
Pam-param
